name: I Shall Be My Own Sword

passive.name: With This Evening Jade
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>. When an ally (excluding the wearer) gets attacked or loses HP, the wearer gains 1 stack of Eclipse, up to a max of {{2}} stack(s). Each stack of Eclipse increases the DMG of the wearer's next attack by <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong>. When {{2}} stack(s) are reached, additionally enables that attack to ignore <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong> of the enemy's DEF. This effect will be removed after the wearer uses an attack.
